description: Gets information about the current Account resource.

nested_items.name: cloudwatchRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an Amazon CloudWatch role for the current Account.

nested_items.name: throttleSettings
nested_items.description: Specifies the API request limits configured for the current Account.

nested_items.name: burstLimit
nested_items.description: The API target request burst rate limit. This allows more requests through for a period of time than the target rate limit.

nested_items.name: rateLimit
nested_items.description: The API target request rate limit.

nested_items.name: features
nested_items.description: A list of features supported for the account. When usage plans are enabled, the features list will include an entry of "UsagePlans".

nested_items.name: apiKeyVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the API keys used for the account.
